text: Robert Mouynet (born 25 March 1930 in Toulon) is a former French footballer.Robert Mouynet profile at footballdatabase.eu He was part of the French squad which finished third at the 1958 FIFA World Cup, but he never won a cap for the France national football team. ==Club career== * 1954-1959: Olympique Lyonnais * 1959-1961: Toulouse FC ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:1958 FIFA World Cup players Category:Olympique Lyonnais players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Association football defenders
title: Robert Mouynet
